resources.string: To scan for Bluetooth devices, you need to grant the required permissions.
This app needs Bluetooth Connect permission to pair and communicate with devices.
Open the link in your browser:\n%1$s
Check the descriptor UUID mask in the device settings or refer to the documentation at\n%1$s
Value must be number between %1$s and %2$s
For writing values to characteristics, you can purchase an extension.

Your device list is empty

Before adding devices to the list, you need to add a simple descriptor to the characteristics you want to manage.
Please refer to the developer documentation.

It's really easy, multiplatform, and you don't need any additional libraries.

%3$s

Thank you for using our app!

Some devices do not support MTU size negotiation. Some devices may have issues with connection or reconnection if a non-default MTU size is set. Be cautious.
Device is not responding. The app will continue trying to connect until the device responds.
You can try reconnecting to see if it resolves the issue.
If you can\'t connect, try turning Bluetooth off and then back on.

The device is not responding
It seems that connecting to the device is taking too long. Please keep in mind that your device must meet Bluetooth Low Energy specifications and implement descriptors according to the developer documentation. Check if your device is in range and ready to connect. If the connection fails, you can try restarting the target device and turning Bluetooth off and then back on in your Android device.
A new version is available. Do you want to update?
